title: How to make money writing on Vocal.Media - Blogging And Marketing - Quora

response.answer_text: Free members earn $1, $2 or $3.80 per thousand readings in their stories, while paid members earn $6 per thousand readings in their stories. At withdrawal, free members can only request a payment if they have reached the minimum amount of $35, paid members must collect their payment when they have $20 in their account.
